Articles.Content:
please could someone make a spaceplane out of vanilla aparts? I\'ve tried searching but all it\'s come up with is people talking about them. i want vanilla so I don\'t end up downloading a rocket needing parts I don\'t have.

EDIT: you can now use C7s Flight Pack parts.

To be honest unless you edit the parameters for the winglets, in which case they will be unrealistic, there\'s no way to make a fully functional spaceplane using stock parts - maybe a glider, but not a spaceplane. Sorry.
Plus - almost everone is using Addon-parts. One of the most famous Packs is 'C7s Flight Pack' (Or something in these lines) - it contains lots of wings, fins and a nice body especially for planes.

Plus - almost everone is using Addon-parts. One of the most famous Packs is 'C7s Flight Pack' (Or something in these lines) - it contains lots of wings, fins and a nice body especially for planes.

ok, I\'ll get that pack, so it\'ll include those parts.
Still looking for a ready design, then? Try the 'Orbital Jumper' someone posted here. From what ive seen its solely made of C7-parts.
